stimulusHtml: The urbanization and growth of the steel producing centers of the Ruhr Valley in Germany and Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, in the United States can best be explained by the site characteristics of
choicesHtml: large, local supplies of iron ore and intersecting railroads
large, local supplies of coal and intersecting rivers
large, local supplies of food and intersecting highways
large, local supplies of skilled labor and seaports
large, local supplies of educated workers and university growth poles
